radiographic_examinations.findings: Linear atelectasis at the lung bases bilaterally. No focal consolidations. No pleural or pericardial effusion. Appendix is dilated measuring up to 1.4 cm with multiple small appendicoliths, wall thickening, and moderate surrounding fat stranding. There is fluid throughout the cecum and ascending colon, as well as within a few small bowel loops, which is likely related to reactive ileus. No bowel obstruction is seen. There is a small amount of nonhemorrhagic free-fluid within the pelvis.
